content.rendered:
Sony Music is for people who do. We want what you’ve got: your talent, your ambition, your ideas and your attitude. In return, we’ll give you the opportunity to make a difference in your discipline, in the business, music and more.

Join us, the stage is yours.

Begin Your Job Search Now



At Sony Music, we seek to empower future industry leaders through an immersive internship experience. With opportunities in marketing, finance, A&R and more, our paid internship programs enable students to interface with industry experts and sharpen their professional skills in an environment that celebrates creativity, diversity, and experiential learning.

Begin Your Internship Search Now
